data.description:
Welcome to Badminton! Step into the court feel the immersion and enjoy the gameplay with the untethered freedom of Oculus Quest.

Badminton is a Virtual Reality(VR) game where you play against advanced AI and there are other amazing game modes. With physics design to be as real as ever and has been achieved in Badminton, don't worry you will forget that you are in VR.

SINGLE-PLAYER EXPERIENCE
In the single-player campaign always know that as you win the harder, demanding, and troublesome it gets!

MULTIPLAYER & ONLINE RANKINGS :
Multiplayer modes are officially now available modes are Ranked, Unranked, Into the Bucket Versus, Hangout, and Champions League.

PHYSICS:
We have been obsessed with creating the most realistic and futuristic Badminton the world has ever seen. We spent countless hours coding to make sure that you get a good experience, and we believe that we have accomplished that goal.

We hope that you enjoy playing Badminton!

changelog.change_log:
NEW GAME UPDATES

1. Added Locomotion
2. Fixed shuttlecock physics
3. Stunning Graphics
4. Awesome and realistic gameplay
5. Fixed Multiplayer bugs and added user reporting
6. Better UI and UX 
7. More Campaign levels
8. Added Leaerbords and other cloud services
9. Many things to buy in the Item Shop
10. The game is currently on sale for 70% off

Advanced Physics: We have spent time developing our own physics with professional badminton players. Based on research, it’s super realistic and translates your moves in an accurate manner.
Multiplayer Modes:
Ranked: This is a competitive player mode with other players from around the world to get the chance to defeat them with your unbeatable skills, the match will be random losses or wins, this mode will affect the player's leaderboard rank.
Unranked: This mode is similar to the ranked mode except your losses or wins do not affect your rank on the leaderboard and you can play with your friends by inviting them, you can also play with other players randomly.
Into The Bucket Versus: A multiplayer mode similar to bucket pong except the first player to hit the shuttlecock into all his opponent’s buckets wins.
Hangout: you can invite up to 10 friends to come to hang with you, y’all can play together watch YouTube together and talk using the available voice chat.
Champions League: this is the extreme competitive mode with its own special competitive, as this mode is only for professionals at the game, a player is expected to have a certain amount of rank score to play this mode, as it will be extremely competitive.
We have fixed some bugs relating to the gameplay mechanics, physics and to make look the game feel as realistic as possible, and also will be adding another mode called Launch Hit in the other modes section
There is a big difference in the whole virtual environment more graphics, looks way better, and is more immersive.
Massive User interface changes and upgrades.
